comment: He is very nice and very helpful. The homework is worth a lot of your grade and if you just do it, you get a 100. We watched a lot of movies too! He was super nice, really cool!

This is a wonderful professor, extremely helpful and knowlegable. There are alot of quizes (one each week) but if you do your readings you'll do just fine. 4 assignments (2 are papers) and then the final research paper nothing too terrible. Attendance is manditory but you won't mind being in class he's grest!
Easy A. He's kind of boring but he's very helpful and clear and if you come to class and try you will get an A.
NOT easy. I got a B and worked hard for it. But very nice and smart.
Great teacher overall! He grades hard but helps get a good grade with later essays. Quizzes on essays every week. Very approachable and smart about this subject.

Great class and great professor. Very helpful when it comes to assignments and papers. Make sure you read the assigned stories in the book because you will usually have a quiz once a week. Take him!!!

He grades really easily, but I felt like my ENGL 1101 class helped more than this one. The quizzes are very difficult, but if you just ramble you'll get full points. Make sure you read just the stories that say NF next to them. That's what the quizzes are over.

Most boring class I've EVER been in. I took it Fridays at 8-10:45 thinking, "Oh, once a week..cool!" Wrong. Essays are easy if you know what your topic will be. Grades easily on those. Quizzes are HORRIBLE. Usually every class, very specific, difficult to pass. Peer review sessions for your essay help some, but boring class. Easy grade, but boring.

This is the most boring class ever! I made the huge mistake of taking it on a friday meaning 2 hrs 45min. The professor uses one tone all the time, and gives you a quiz over the pointless reading your required to do. He never gives you enough time to answer the questions, so either you dont finsh or you do but they arent fully answered. Horrible!
BEST ENGLISH TEACHER. I hate English class but he made it an easy painless experience. A few papers but he grades really light.
Great Professor. The class can be slow and boring, but nothing is difficult. Papers are easy and with the simple quiz and particiption grades you get, it is very easy to make an A.

I went from a C in 1101 to an A in 1102. Quizzes every other class. Group activity every other day. Talk about what you read the night before. Talk about how you felt about the readings = class participation grade.  Paper = stupid easy

I joined his class about 4 or 5 days later because I dropped my other english class.  At first the class was very slow and boring, but as the semester progressed it was alright.  I got a B because I was lazy and didn't do some of the readings, but he is very cool and understanding.  Not a hard class at all if you do what you need to.  Papers=easy!

Prof Mayne is really laid back. He is a easy and fair grader and gives you chances for extra credit. Reading every night and quizzes once a week. There are 5 papers that are on the same subject of your choice. I would recommend him!

He is a very easy going and flexible. As long as you read the assigned readings which are not very long and participate in class you are almost guaranteed an A. Also be prepared to take short quizzes once a week to prove that you read.
Extremely helpful and understanding of students. easy A if you read and be prepared for quizzes at least every week

Really intelligent, really helpful guy. He lays out what he expects very clearly. You're expected to be there, and you're expected to read (there are quizzes) but its definitely manageable. I didn't find his grading too strict. Overall, it was an enjoyable class. (also: make sure you get the book WITH the readings)

Expects you to work hard but gives you every opportunity to succeed. He's really smart, very approachable, very clear in his expectations. Attendance is mandatory, and there's a fair amount of reading. Nothing outrageous, though. Did very well in this class. Would definitely recommend.
He is a really smart guy. He was my favorite teacher this semester, he is very helpful and easy to talk to about things. If you dont have a problem with reading then you should like him too
smart and very nice. graded hard at first and told me how to get an A. lots of reading.
Easy to talk to,and interesting for a composition course. Actually enjoyed it. Didn't think he was an easy grader. Didn't cancel my class!
He is really  nice and grades essays really easily. Just make sure you do the reading because there will be a quiz on it.
he is very boring, but grades essays quite fairly.

Attendance is mandatory. Although he is a really boring teacher, and in my opinon, has a speech impetiment, he is SUPER EASY ! He cancells class ALL the time ! We had 4 papers that ran off of the last essay we did. Alot of readings from the book and group discusions. If u didn't pass this class, you just didn't show up.

We had a quiz every Thursday, there was reading for almost every class. He had us write 4 essays but it technically was only one..we just added info to it. Although his class was BORING he grades papers SOOO easily!
